;Draggable Alt1 GLR [Groundlightrail] Section
;---------------------------------------------------
;This section uses the "lightrail" network to create draggable Alt1 GLR.
;Last update: 18 Sept 2010 by Chrisim
;;
;;
;straight GLR - 0x08031500 > 0x5f888000
0x5f888000,1,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888000,1,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888000,3,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f888000,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888000,3,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f888000,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
;
0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f880000,1,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f880000,3,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888000,3,0,0x5f880000,1,0=0x5f888000,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888000,3,0,0x5f880000,3,0=0x5f888000,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
;
;
;diagonal GLR - 0x08001A00 > 0x5f888600
0x5f888600,2,0,0x08001A00,2,0=0x5f888600,2,0,0x5f888600,0,0
0x5f888600,1,0,0x08001A00,1,0=0x5f888600,1,0,0x5f888600,3,0
;
0x5f888600,2,0,0x5f880600,0,0=0x5f888600,2,0,0x5f888600,0,0
0x5f888600,1,0,0x5f880600,3,0=0x5f888600,1,0,0x5f888600,3,0
;
;
;end caps
0x5f888000,1,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888000,3,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f888000,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
;diagonal end caps aren't yet completed
0x5f888600,2,0,0x08000200,1,0=0x5f888600,2,0,0x5f888600,0,0
0x5f888600,1,0,0x08000200,3,1=0x5f888600,1,0,0x5f888600,3,0
;
;
;corner - 0x5f882e00 > 0x5f888200
0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f882e00,1,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888200,1,0
0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f882e00,2,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888200,2,0
;next to ...
; > straight GLR
0x5f888200,0,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f888200,0,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888200,0,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f888200,0,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888200,3,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f888200,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888200,3,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f888200,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
;end caps
0x5f888200,0,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f888200,0,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888200,3,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f888200,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
; > GLR corner
; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad
; > GLRxStreet
; > GLRxOneWayRoad
; > GLRxRail
; > GLRxAvenue
; > GLRxdiagRoad
; > GLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > GLRxdiagRail
; > GLRxdiagAvenue
;
;
;T-intersection - 0x5f882f00 > 0x5f889200
0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f882f00,1,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f889200,1,0
0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f882f00,2,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f889200,2,0
0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f882f00,3,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f889200,3,0
;next to ...
; > straight GLR
0x5f889200,0,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f889200,0,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889200,0,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f889200,0,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889200,1,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f889200,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889200,1,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f889200,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889200,3,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f889200,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889200,3,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f889200,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
;end caps
0x5f889200,0,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f889200,0,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889200,1,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f889200,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889200,3,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f889200,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
; > GLR corner
; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
0x5f889200,1,0,0x082E2D00,0,0=0x5f889200,3,0,0x5f889100,0,0
0x5f889200,1,0,0x082E2D00,1,0=0x5f889200,3,0,0x5f889100,1,0
0x5f889200,1,0,0x082E2D00,2,0=0x5f889200,3,0,0x5f889100,2,0
0x5f889200,1,0,0x082E2D00,3,0=0x5f889200,3,0,0x5f889100,3,0
;fix
0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f889200,0,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f889200,2,0
0x5f888000,3,0,0x5f889200,0,0=0x5f888000,3,0,0x5f889200,2,0
0x08031500,1,0,0x5f889200,0,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f889200,2,0
0x08031500,3,0,0x5f889200,0,0=0x5f888000,3,0,0x5f889200,2,0
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad
; > GLRxStreet
; > GLRxOneWayRoad
; > GLRxRail
; > GLRxAvenue
; > GLRxdiagRoad
; > GLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > GLRxdiagRail
; > GLRxdiagAvenue
;
;
;+-intersection - 0x082E2D00 > 0x5f889100
0x5f888000,1,0,0x082E2D00,0,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f889100,0,0
0x5f888000,1,0,0x082E2D00,1,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f889100,1,0
0x5f888000,1,0,0x082E2D00,2,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f889100,2,0
0x5f888000,1,0,0x082E2D00,3,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f889100,3,0
;next to ...
; > straight GLR
0x5f889100,0,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f889100,0,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889100,0,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f889100,0,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889100,1,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f889100,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889100,1,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f889100,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889100,2,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f889100,2,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889100,2,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f889100,2,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889100,3,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f889100,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889100,3,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f889100,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
;end caps
0x5f889100,0,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f889100,0,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889100,1,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f889100,1,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889100,2,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f889100,2,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f889100,3,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f889100,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
; > GLR corner
; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad
; > GLRxStreet
; > GLRxOneWayRoad
; > GLRxRail
; > GLRxAvenue
; > GLRxdiagRoad
; > GLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > GLRxdiagRail
; > GLRxdiagAvenue
;
;
;orth-diag1 - 0x08031600 > 0x5f888500
0x5f888000,1,0,0x08031600,3,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888500,1,0
0x5f888000,1,0,0x08031600,1,1=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888500,3,1
;
0x5f888500,1,0,0x08002200,1,0=0x5f888500,1,0,0x5f888400,1,0
0x5f888500,3,1,0x08002200,3,1=0x5f888500,3,1,0x5f888400,3,1
;next to ...
; > straight GLR
0x5f888500,1,1,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f888500,1,1,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888500,1,1,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f888500,1,1,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888500,3,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f888500,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888500,3,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f888500,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
;end caps
0x5f888500,1,1,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f888500,1,1,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888500,3,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f888500,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
; > GLR corner
; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > orthGRLxdiagGLR
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad
; > GLRxStreet
; > GLRxOneWayRoad
; > GLRxRail
; > GLRxAvenue
; > GLRxdiagRoad
; > GLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > GLRxdiagRail
; > GLRxdiagAvenue
;
;
;orth-2waydiag1 - 0x08031A00 > 0x5f888800
0x5f888000,1,0,0x08031A00,3,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888800,1,0
;
0x5f888800,1,0,0x08014E00,2,0=0x5f888800,1,0,0x5f888700,1,0
;
0x5f888700,0,0,0x08001C00,3,1=0x5f888700,0,0,0x5f888600,0,0
0x08001C00,3,1,0x5f888700,0,0=0x5f888600,1,0,0x5f888700,0,0
;next to ...
; > straight GLR
0x5f888800,3,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f888800,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888800,3,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f888800,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
;end caps
0x5f888800,3,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f888800,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0
; > GLR corner
; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad
; > GLRxStreet
; > GLRxOneWayRoad
; > GLRxRail
; > GLRxAvenue
; > GLRxdiagRoad
; > GLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > GLRxdiagRail
; > GLRxdiagAvenue

;2orthxdiag1 - 0x08031700 > 0x5f888c00
0x5f888000,1,0,0x08031700,3,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888c00,1,0
0x5f888000,1,0,0x08031700,1,1=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888c00,3,1

0x5f888c00,3,1,0x08032500,3,1=0x5f888c00,3,1,0x5f888b00,3,1
;next to ...
; > straight GLR
0x5f888c00,1,1,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f888c00,1,1,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888c00,1,1,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f888c00,1,1,0x5f888000,1,0

0x5f888b00,3,1,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f888b00,3,1,0x5f888000,1,0
;end caps
0x5f888c00,1,1,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f888c00,1,1,0x5f888000,1,0
0x5f888c00,3,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f888c00,3,0,0x5f888000,1,0

; > GLR corner
; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > orthGRLxdiagGLR
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad
; > GLRxStreet
; > GLRxOneWayRoad
; > GLRxRail
; > GLRxAvenue
; > GLRxdiagRoad
; > GLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > GLRxdiagRail
; > GLRxdiagAvenue
;
;
;2orthx2waydiag1 - 0x08031B00 > 0x5f888A00
0x5f888000,1,0,0x08031B00,3,0=0x5f888000,1,0,0x5f888a00,1,0

;next to ...
; > straight GLR

; > GLR corner
; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad
; > GLRxStreet

;orth-diag2 - 0x08002200 > 0x5f888400
0x5f888600,1,0,0x08002200,0,1=0x5f888600,1,0,0x5f888400,0,1

0x5f888400,3,0,0x08031600,1,0=0x5f888400,3,0,0x5f888500,3,0
;next to ...
; > diag GLR
0x5f888400,0,0,0x08001A00,2,0=0x5f888400,0,0,0x5f888600,0,0
0x5f888400,2,1,0x08001A00,1,0=0x5f888400,2,1,0x5f888600,3,0
; > orth-diag2
; > 2orthxdiag2
; > diagjunction
0x5f888400,0,0,0x08001C00,2,0=0x5f888400,0,0,0x5f889400,0,1
0x5f888400,2,1,0x08001C00,0,1=0x5f888400,2,1,0x5f889400,2,0
; > orthGLRxdiagGLR
; > y-intersection
; > diagGLRxRoad
; > diagGLRxOneWayRoad
; > diagGLRxRail
; > diagGLRxAvenue
; > diagGLRxdiagRoad
; > diagGLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > diagGLRxdiagRail
; > diagGLRxdiagAvenue
;
;
;orth-2waydiag2 - 0x08014E00 > 0x5f888700
0x5f888600,1,0,0x08001C00,0,1=0x5f888600,1,0,0x5f888600,3,0

;0x5f888700,3,0,0x5f888500,3,0=0x5f888700,3,0,0x5f888800,3,0
;0x5f888700,3,0,0x5f888500,1,1=0x5f888700,3,0,0x5f888800,3,0

0x5f889400,3,1,0x5f888700,0,0=0x5f888600,1,0,0x5f888700,0,0
;next to ...
; > diag GLR
0x5f888700,0,0,0x08001C00,3,1=0x5f888700,0,0,0x5f888600,0,0
0x5f888700,2,0,0x08001C00,1,0=0x5f888700,2,0,0x5f888600,3,0

0x5f888700,2,0,0x08AA6600,1,0=0x5f888700,2,0,0x5f888600,3,0
; > diagjunction
0x5f888700,0,0,0x08AA6500,0,1=0x5f888700,0,0,0x5f889300,2,1
0x5f888700,2,0,0x08AA6500,2,0=0x5f888700,2,0,0x5f889300,0,0

; > GLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > GLRxdiagRail
; > GLRxdiagAvenue
;
;
;diagonals
;
